chunk_text:
## Tiny Weddings/Receptions - $2995
• Central heating and air conditioning
• Beautifully appointed wedding party suites to get ready
• Indoor restrooms with handicapped accessibility
• Wedding ceremony/reception chairs (up to 200)
• Five foot round tables (up to 13)
• Historic bell from 1888, that you can ring after the ceremony
• On-site parking, with one hour of a parking attendant
• Food Prep Room
• Exclusive in-house catering available from our chef for an additional fee
• Built in Beverage Station (Hide-away Bar)
• Special purchases on wine through West Hills Vineyards (Minimum purchase of 1 case per 40 guests required)
• Built in sound system
## The CHAPEL Package - $5200
**Historical Home, Lawn, Tent, & Pavilion Includes:**
• Historical home (two get ready suites & a gathering room)
• 400 square foot pavilion with chandeliers
• 20,000 square feet of manicured lawn space
• 4,000 square foot white tent with bistro lighting on the lawn
• Governor's gazebo with chandelier and power outlets
• 400 square foot patio area with bistro lighting
• Bistro tables
• Granite bar
• Four six-foot buffet tables
• 19 five-foot round tables
• White folding padded chairs (up to 200)
• Private luxury restroom trailer for your guests
• Handicapped accessible family bathroom
• On-site parking and one hour parking attendant
• Food Prep Room
• Special purchases on wine through West Hills Vineyards
(A minimum wine purchase of 1 case per 40 guests)
## The OUTDOOR Package - $5200
Includes all of the spaces: Chapel, Historical home, Lawn, Tent, & Pavilion with patio area.
